title: Simple but tasty chicken tikka masala
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 large onion, finely chopped', '2 red peppers - seeded and finely chopped', '4 tablespoons tikka masala curry paste', '4 chicken breasts, diced', '1 (400g) tin tomato soup', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '4 tablespoons mango chutney', '150g low fat natural yoghurt', 'curry powder, taste', 'chopped fresh coriander, to taste']
